tooltips.response_time: Average time a contact waits for a response per message
tooltips.waiting_time: Average wait time until first response

conversations_dashboard.title: Conversational

tooltips.total: Total conversations started in the period. A conversation is counted 24 hours after the contact's first message.
tooltips.resolved: Conversations closed with a clear, effective resolution for the contact
tooltips.unresolved: Conversations closed for other reasons, such as quick exchanges, greetings, abandonment, or without a direct resolution
tooltips.unengaged: Conversation with minimal engagement. This includes greetings or emojis only, or cases closed without interaction.
tooltips.transferred: Chat windows that required human support

form_topic.title: Edit topics and subtopics
form_topic.context_description: Add context to improve AI classification

remove_modal.description_remove_topic: Are you sure you want to delete the topic {topic}? This will also delete all subtopics. Data previously associated with this topic will be unclassified and no longer accessible through this classification.
remove_modal.description_remove_sub_topic: Are you sure you want to delete the subtopic {sub_topic}? Data previously associated with this subtopic will be unclassified and no longer accessible through this classification.

cancel_modal.title: Cancel topic editing
cancel_modal.description_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? All progress will be lost.

form_topic.disclaimer: Adding topics allows the AI to use them to classify conversations automatically. This will help the AI better understand conversations and provide more accurate responses.

most_talked_about_topics.title: Most common topics
most_talked_about_topics.no_topics_description: Add a topic to start analyzing conversations

conversations_dashboard.no_data_available: No data available for the usage period

customize_your_dashboard.title: Customize your dashboard
customize_your_dashboard.description: Customize the dashboard with your key metrics
customize_your_dashboard.csat_description: Customer Satisfaction Score (CSAT) measures how satisfied contacts are with the service they received
customize_your_dashboard.nps_description: Net Promoter Score (NPS) measures how likely contacts are to recommend your service
customize_your_dashboard.config_csat_or_nps_description: Set which {type} you want to track
customize_your_dashboard.sales_funnel_description: Track your sales: total orders, average ticket, total value and conversion funnel.

modal_attention.description_return: Are you sure you want to go back? By confirming, all progress will be lost.
modal_attention.description_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? By confirming, all progress will be lost.

modal_remove_widget.title: Remove widget {type}

horizontal_bar_chart.description: View with horizontal bars, where bar length indicates the value magnitude.

insights_header.set_default_dashboard_success: Now the {dashboard} dashboard is your homepage
insights_header.set_default_dashboard_error: Error setting the {dashboard} dashboard as your homepage

generate_insight.title: Generate insight
generate_insight.error: Couldn't generate insights. Check your internet connection and try again later.
generate_insight.prompt: Analyze the performance of a human support operation results dashboard. The dashboard displays three main categories: in progress, closed, and waiting for support. Additionally, evaluate these metrics: first response, wait time, and interaction time. Identify efficiency patterns and possible bottlenecks in the support flow, and offer suggestions to optimize response time and team productivity. Data: {values}

edit_dashboard.title: Edit dashboard
edit_dashboard.delete_dashboard_notice: This action is irreversible. To confirm, type the dashboard name.

delete_dashboard.title: Delete dashboard
delete_dashboard.notice: This action is irreversible. To confirm, type the dashboard name.

create_dashboard.title: Create a custom dashboard
create_dashboard.description: Create as many dashboards as you want. Click New dashboard to start.

define_metric.title: Set metric
define_metric.description: Click here to set the metric you want to view

select_widget_type.title: Select widget
select_widget_type.description: Select the type of metric you want to configure. If you have any doubts, start by testing in Runs.
select_widget_type.general_description: Select the type of metric you want to configure

set_metric.title: Set metric
set_metric.description: After selecting the metric type, select a flow that provides relevant data for your operation. Complete the remaining fields and save.

define_metric.title: Keep exploring possibilities
define_metric.description: See your main VTEX sales data or track the journey of your contacts

select_widget_type.title: Select the ideal widget
select_widget_type.description: See your main VTEX sales data or track the journey of your contacts

fill_metric.title: Configure the widget
fill_metric.description: Complete the fields to configure your widget and get valuable data

dashboard_commerce.title: See what's happening in: Abandoned cart

errors.title: Couldn't load data
errors.description: Couldn't load data. Try again later.

infos.send-message: Number of times the agent sent a message starting an interaction
infos.delivered-messages: Number of times messages were delivered
infos.read-messages: Number of times messages were read
infos.interactions: Number of times the contact interacted with the message

export_data.title: Export data
export_data.tooltip: An export is in progress. You'll be able to create a new report for this project when the export is complete.
export_data.description: Select the information you want to export. The complete file will be sent to your email after confirmation.
export_data.feedback: You'll receive the file by email shortly. Remember to check your spam folder.

select_data.label: Select the date range to fetch data (maximum 92 days between start and end date)

export_data.chats_open: Include open chats during this period
export_data.chats_closed: Include closed chats during this period
export_data.select_format: Select the format to export the data
export_data.warning_terms: While the export is in progress, creating new exports will be blocked for all project profiles. Confirm to continue.
export_data.error_pending_export: A report is already in progress for this project. Try again later.

disconnectAgent.title: Disconnect agent
disconnectAgent.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect the agent {agent}?
disconnectAgent.description_confirm: Agent {agent} will be offline after confirmation
disconnectAgent.tooltip_disabled: This agent cannot be disconnected because it is offline

tooltips.is_waiting: Number of contacts waiting for the start of the support now
tooltips.is_in_progress: Number of contacts in support now
tooltips.is_closed_by_date: Number of closed supports in the selected period

tooltips.average_time_is_waiting: Average time contacts wait in the queue until the support starts
tooltips.average_time_first_response: Average time until the first message from the agent after the room is assigned
tooltips.average_response_time: Average time a contact waits for a response per message
tooltips.average_time_chat: Average total duration of the conversation, from the start of the support with the agent until it is finalized

analyze.title: Soon: New Analysis View
analyze.description: Here you will be able to explore historical data with time filters to identify patterns and make more strategic decisions. We are preparing this new feature for you!
